text: IBF NB 87 was a floorball club in the town of Karlstad in Sweden. It was established as a merger out of the Norrstands IF and Bengens IBF floorball sections in 1987. In 2001 it merged with Sj√∂stads IF, establishing Karlstads IBF. The men's team played the 1996 Swedish national championship finals. They lost to Balrog IK. ==References== Category:1987 establishments in Sweden Category:Floorball clubs in Sweden Category:Sport in Karlstad
title: IBF NB 87
